site.title: Daniel Micallef – Portfolio

hero.name: Daniel Micallef
hero.pitch: I combine Web Development, Artificial Intelligence and Project Management to help business launch, and scale their products, or automate their workflows

values.title: My Values
values.subtitle: These three values shape my work and help me design compelling software.
values.card1Text: I prioritize building technology that serves people responsibly and contributes positively to society.
values.card2Text: I believe in building clear, reliable systems and user experiences that feel effortless.
values.card3Text: I value collaboration, mentoring, and knowledge-sharing as essential parts of sustainable engineering.

skills.title: Skills & Tools
skills.subtitle: With these tools and skills, I implement projects efficiently and creatively.

backend.title: Backend & Architecture
backend.description: Designing robust APIs, orchestrating cloud services, and keeping systems reliable and scalable.

frontend.title: Frontend & UX

aiML.title: Data & Applied AI

databases.title: Databases
databases.description: Storing data in a structured, easily accessible format.

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my work from various fields – from UX/UI Design to Motion Design and Web Development.

dbTrainingRelaunch.shortDescription: Conception and design of a new education platform with optimized course finder and booking process.
dbTrainingRelaunch.challenge: Optimizing user experience and conversion in searching and booking courses.
dbTrainingRelaunch.approach: Development of a user-centered, mobile-optimized design focusing on intuitive navigation and clear booking CTAs.
dbTrainingRelaunch.result: 36% higher conversion and 22% lower bounce rate in the booking process compared to the previous version.

mediaDashboard.shortDescription: Development of an interactive dashboard for real-time analysis of campaign performance across all channels.
mediaDashboard.challenge: Integration of various data sources (GA4, Meta Ads, LinkedIn) into a clear real-time display.
mediaDashboard.approach: Conception and implementation of a modular dashboard with customizable KPI cards and filter functions.
mediaDashboard.result: Reduction of reporting time by 68% and improved decision-making through daily KPI monitoring.

dbExplainerVideos.shortDescription: Series of animated explainer videos that convey complex digitalization projects simply and engagingly.
dbExplainerVideos.challenge: Simplifying technically complex content for a broad audience without technical expertise.
dbExplainerVideos.approach: Development of a visual storytelling concept with a consistent corporate design and clear visual language.
dbExplainerVideos.result: Average 82% view-through rate and positive feedback from executives and project teams.

timeline.title: My Career Path
timeline.subtitle: Education, professional experience, and important milestones in my career so far.

experience.title: Fullstack Developer
experience.description: Worked with various companies, focusing on launching, and scaling their products, building landing pages, and automating workflows

experience.title: Fullstack Developer
experience.description: Created a number of B2B projects, were we collect data generated by AI models from thousands of devices, aggregating it, and making it available through an API and providing a corresponding interface. The main tools we leveraged are FastAPI, Pydantic, Kafka, Redis, ReactJS and Docker. Different databases including MongoDB, PostgreSQL, TimescaleDB, and SQLite, are used depending on the requirements of the specific project.

experience.title: Python Developer/Senior Python Developer
experience.description: Developing a Python library helping developers create explainable AI. Libraries like Pyspark, Pydantic, SQLAlchemy, and Pandas were used in the process.

experience.title: Python Developer/Senior Python Developer
experience.description: Core part of the team creating GIG Comply, a web crawler analysing text and images in thousands of web pages, confirming compliance with the law.

experience.title: Application Developer
experience.description: Wrote and maintained plugins for Atlassian JIRA, using Java and VanillaJS, including mail handlers tranforming emails to JIRA issues. Was also involved in supporting RS2 clients through bug-fixing, and onboarding support.

experience.title: Student Intern
experience.description: Formed part of the R&D team at RS2, investigating different use cases for Docker and Vagrant for the company. Used Python to write scripts and automate workflows.

experience.title: B.Sc in Artificial Intelligence
experience.description: As a dissertation Project for Bachelor's Degree I collected a number of CT Brain scans and tried to use different Decision Tree algorithms to detect if there is a pathological area in the brain scan.
